title: Need a last minute gift for an Apple lover? This refurb Apple TV is now $70!
content:
Macworld

Your favorite Apple lover on your list likely has all the goods already — a MacBook or two, an iPhone, AirPods, etc. However, you can still gift them something from their favorite brand, like this pre-loved Apple TV that comes with a Siri-enabled remote!

You can now save on this refurbished 4th Gen Apple TV before the holidays. Now through December 17, it’s only $69.97 (reg. $149). Just order by December 7 so it arrives on time.

This easy-to-setup, Grade B refurbished 4th Gen Apple TV can transform any HD TV, providing access to the App Store, top streaming services like Netflix and Hulu, 32GB of storage, and streaming via AirPlay. Boasting an Apple A8 chip, users can enjoy enhanced audio and graphics (1080p HD streaming!), while its Dolby Digital Plus 7.1 offers surround sound. All you need to do is plug this 2015 Apple TV into a socket and connect an HDMI cable to your HD TV!

Plus, it comes with a remote equipped with Siri, giving users easy navigation of their Apple TV with its touch surface design, built-in mic, and Bluetooth connectivity.

Gift an Apple lover (or yourself!) this refurbished 4th Gen Apple TV with a Siri-enabled remote for just $69.97 through December 17 at 11:59 p.m. Pacific. Order by December 7 at 11:59 p.m. Pacific for on-time holiday delivery!
